name: Pieces (itch) (NyctoManiac)
description:
Project Description:

Pieces is a game my teammates and I developed for our collaborative project in the first semester at Cologne Game Lab (CGL). Our theme for this project was: Mobile (Kinekit Sculpture)

For this project, I decided to work on the sound design and the music production of the game; something that I've always been interested to learn more about! It was my first time dealing with sounds and music in a game project.

Group Members:

- Ehsan Tabesh (Sound Design & Music)

- Maksim Martynov (Programming)

- Aizhan Konuspayeva (Art)

- Clara Margaritha Georgi (Game Design)

Controls & Tutorial:

- Move the aiming arrow with A and D.

- Shoot the ball in the direction of the arrow by pressing and holding Space.

- You must hit and move all the pieces into their place before you run out of shots.

- After completing a level, shoot the ball to the right of the screen to go to the next level!
